title: 0.00 fight duration.... hmmmmm
body:
so this is something that happened.
fun.
ik she was fed and i was behind, but a **LITERAL** instakill... seems kinda unreasonable doesnt it?

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/547535992177950720/639596248965447681/unknown.png

replies.body: here i thought that was rengar.

> [{quoted}](name=Corrector1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BnEPildE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-11-04T15:48:40.881+0000)
>
> here i thought that was rengar.

lol i see why you'd think that but no, its the other stupid assassin with a click-on dash that allows you to guarantee hitting another ability that is your main damage...

No, it doesn't seem unreasonable. You acknowledge that she was fed and you were behind, but you don't grasp the implications. If the two of you were more even in levels/items, you would've lived longer. The game isn't and shouldn't be balanced around a 1/8 squishy ADC/support facing a 14/0 assassin who's five levels ahead.

Given how long her R takes, I don't think it's possible to get all her abilities to hit in the same tick.

Seems like a bug to me.
Some times I miss being able to do 1,500-2K magic damage with 1 point and click ultimate. {{champion:45}} {{champion:18}}
15/0 and 5 levels ahead.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pebEONk7TSY

Full tank Ornn. Still a 3 shot.

Damage is too bloody high dude. Assassins players are the most insecure, so buy more skins I guess.

The sad part is even if I'd finished my last MR item, and elixer... the next two abilities would have killed me anyway.

> [{quoted}](name=The Bad Touch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BnEPildE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-11-04T16:23:52.319+0000)
>
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pebEONk7TSY
> 
> Full tank Ornn. Still a 3 shot.
> 
> Damage is too bloody high dude. Assassins players are the most insecure, so buy more skins I guess.
> 
> The sad part is even if I'd finished my last MR item, and elixer... the next two abilities would have killed me anyway.

WTF how did she do 4506 damage that quickly lol.
Was this urf?
Nope. This was a ranked game back earlier this year. I kept it around because it sums up why all my friends quit league. :)

> [{quoted}](name=The Bad Touch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BnEPildE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-11-04T16:23:52.319+0000)
>
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pebEONk7TSY
> 
> Full tank Ornn. Still a 3 shot.
> 
> Damage is too bloody high dude. Assassins players are the most insecure, so buy more skins I guess.
> 
> The sad part is even if I'd finished my last MR item, and elixer... the next two abilities would have killed me anyway.

yep

Oh cry more. You've posted this in how many threads? Evelynn's entire kit revolves around E, not R. You face tanked her charm, and didn't use your kit right at all. If you had walked away for 2 seconds or E'd the wall, you would have lived, because she wouldn't have erased your MR.

If it wasn't off my recent game history I'd show you a game where I 1v1'd Evelynn with a friggin Nami After she had 20+ kills and full build.

https://blitz.gg/lol/match/na1/Illabethe/3181669617

This is an Evelynn Specific trait, as ONE champion does need to counter tanks in the entire roster. Never mind the fact Evelynn is less mobile than Ornn.

Sounds like an entitled Ornn with the most Armor and Resist in the game feels he should autowin because he lasted beyond 20 minutes and upgraded people.

(P.S. I play all the champions we're discussing, so it's not like I'm favoring Eve, or decrying Ornn. My point is, like every other champ in the game, you finally got punished for misplaying.)

Is the death timer bugged maybe? I don't think it's possible to land all skills and have 0.00s unless they're delayed skills all hitting at once. Rengar had it because he literally just would right click you and insta kill you in 1 auto lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Ðeviruchi,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BnEPildE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-11-04T16:22:31.460+0000)
>
> Is the death timer bugged maybe? I don't think it's possible to land all skills and have 0.00s unless they're delayed skills all hitting at once. Rengar had it because he literally just would right click you and insta kill you in 1 auto lol.

nope its not bugged, she used both abilities at the same time because she can do that... and she just e then q'd because the e damage comes out when she reaches the target she used it on and she q'd at the same time her e hit me, instakilling me

Her Q hits up to 3 times depending on how it's used.

All she did was E and Q him, because he was a nub and got close enough to get E'd.

Keep in mind this is level 9 vs level 14. She had no HP.

Rengar doesn't kill in 1 auto. He kills in a Leap followed by an auto. The leap itself doesn't secure the kill. It's the auto that follows after.

Qiyana's battle timer starts when she actually does the damage.

Isn't this what Rito was working on in the previous years?

Just make the game faster, easier to snowball, push tactic to be less important. But seems like a lot of people like this, because once in 20 games they can be the "OMEGALUL OP PWNER xxx420xxx 69", and they prefer that.
Or...... OP is level 9 vs a level 14 Qiyana and got close enough for her to E him.

> [{quoted}](name=Ph03n1xb1rd,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BnEPildE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-11-04T15:50:54.165+0000)
>
> Isn't this what Rito was working on in the previous years?
> 
> Just make the game faster, easier to snowball, push tactic to be less important. But seems like a lot of people like this, because once in 20 games they can be the "OMEGALUL OP PWNER xxx420xxx 69", and they prefer that.

sadly
She wasn't just ahead. She was FIVE levels ahead, had enough Lethality to put you below 0 Armor. You had crap for HP because you didn't level in lane.

> [{quoted}](name=Illabethe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BnEPildE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-11-04T17:16:18.450+0000)
>
> She wasn't just ahead. She was FIVE levels ahead, had enough Lethality to put you below 0 Armor. You had crap for HP because you didn't level in lane.

well what im saying is that you should never be able to literally instakill someone in a normal gamemode when both players are in the game and actively playing the entire game and I was leveling in lane nearly the whole game...
Bummer because that's a part of the game going back to when it was still in Beta,
SEASON 9 CHAMP KEKW rengo better hide he got competition
